name: beak
content:
beak noun [C]
(BIRD'S MOUTH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 the hard, pointed part of a bird's mouth: Birds use their beaks to pick up food.
Tim Platt/Stone/GettyImages

beak noun [C]
(NOSE)
informal a large nose: He'd be handsome if it wasn't for that huge beak of his.
